title: Towards Noncommutative Integrable Systems
abstract: We present a strong method to generate various equations which have the Lax representations on noncommutative (1+1) and (2+1)-dimensional spaces. The generated equations contain noncommutative integrable equations obtained by using the bicomplex method and by reductions of the noncommutative (anti-)self-dual Yang-Mills equation. This suggests that noncommutative Lax equations would be integrable and be derived from reductions of the noncommutative (anti-)self-dual Yang-Mills equations, which implies the noncommutative version of Richard Ward conjecture.
